data.name: Scorchlands
data.detailed_description:
DISCOVER MORE AMAZING GAMES

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1362560/Fire_Commander/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1149620/Gas_Station_Simulator/


About the Game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/811550/MythBusters_The_Game__Crazy_Experiments_Simulator/

Lead a civilization of bird folk on their planetary colonization quest. You will start with just one tiny settlement and expand it into a vast network of connected colonies. Every strip of land gives you an opportunity to develop your colony in multiple ways.

It’s all about creativity, clever positioning, and making your colonies grow!

TERRAFORM THE LAND


Explore an unwelcoming, alien world and shape it through arcane terraformation. Change a volcanic wasteland into a green meadow or a desert to access different resource veins. Then mine and use these resources to expand your range of facilities and units.

As your research continues, you will gain access to new biomes that come with exclusive perks.

MANAGE RESOURCE PRODUCTION


Place buildings so they boost each other and gain bonuses from nearby terrain. Unlock new biomes and dozens of technologies that will support your colony’s growth.

Have fun with the emergent gameplay where you encounter situations and challenges stemming from the open nature of the game.

BUILD A NETWORK OF TRANSPORT LASERS


Play with giant lasers to create a logistics network that transports resources between your colonies. Since the beams go in a straight line, you will have to change their direction using mirrors to avoid obstacles and reach the settlements far away.

PLAY AT YOUR OWN PACE


There’s no pressure, no time limit, no enemy nipping at your heels. The game instantly reacts to your decisions. The pacing depends on you and you alone. Nothing will slow down your gameplay!

FEATURES


  • Experience a unique mix between a city builder and a factory game.
  • Terraform the world around you and exploit the biomes you create.
  • Design your own creative solutions and find yourself pausing to admire your own work.
  • Never wait for anything! Play as fast or slow as you want.
  • 4 biomes, 20+ buildings, 30+ resources, 50+ technologies - and more to come!

data.short_description: Scorchlands is a 3D fantasy game where you COLONIZE and TERRAFORM a volcanic planet. Manage resource production, conduct research, and set up a network of transport lasers. Play at your own pace and relax in a setting that combines magic and science.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-6400 CPU @ 2.70GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050Ti 4GB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: System requirements may change during the development of the game.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Catalina, Mojave, High Sierra, Sierra, OSX El Capitan, Yosemite
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2012 Mac
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any
